MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG2 and DG3 postcode areas of Dumfries and Thornhill. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:49pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:45 PM on Sunday, 07 February 2021.
